This award strives to conserve biodiversity and manage natural resources in ways that maintain their long-term viability and preserve their potential to meet the needs of present and future generations. Activities include combating illegal and corrupt exploitation of natural resources and the control of invasive species. This includes The purpose of this proposal is to work with local government organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their anti-poaching patrolling by continuing to strengthen their Law Enforcement Monitoring (LEM) program. This will be done by: (1) providing the Hunchun Nature Reserve (HNR) with subsidies for the field work of patrollers and fuel to allow conduct of an additional 144 Law Enforcement Monitoring patrols within the reserve, (2) supporting Hunchun Municipality Forestry Bureau staff to conduct 72 LEM patrols in rural areas outside HNR in Hunchun through provision of technical and financial support; (3) creating a performance-based incentive mechanism to improve patrol quality in Hunchun; and (4) supporting Hunchun Forestry Public Security officers through provision of technical and financial support in conduct of at least 30 targeted law enforcement raids..
